pages.text: If you followed my advice, you've probably received your first visitor.$(br2)I hope you're a skilled builder; It's a rare talent these days!$(br2)I bet your visitors would appreciate a bit of shelter.$(br2)Visitors are picky. Keep the room shape simple.
Hint: Rooms should have four walls (at least 2 blocks tall) and a door. Build them near the town flag.
